content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Station at (-15, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest at (23.5, -16.5) for coal collection

###Iron Mining Station at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest at (-14.5, 21.5) for iron ore collection

###Copper Processing Complex at (20, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Wooden chest at (20.5, 21.5) for copper ore collection
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0) for smelting
- Wooden chest at (24.5, 17.5) for copper plate storage
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving items between furnace and storage chest
- Burner inserter at (22.5, 20.5) moving items to furnace
- Burner inserter at (20.5, 22.5) moving mined ore to collection chest

###Unused Furnace Group at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at (-11.0, 20.0)
- Stone furnace at (-9.0, 20.0)

ERROR TIPS

###Errors when attempting to connect belts directly to chests
- Belts cannot be connected directly to wooden chests
- Use inserters to move items between chests and belts
- Always place inserters as intermediaries between chests and belt systems

###Entity status issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure regular fuel supply
- Furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" - ensure proper item input flow
- One furnace showing "fuel source is full" - this is not necessarily an error but indicates inefficient resource usage
